title: Can a trombone player play trumpet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Certainly - anyone can play any instrument regardless of if they play another instrument or not, it’s just a matter of passion, enjoyment and dedication! I have been thinking about picking up the trumpet, as a trombonist myself - and I’ve heard that for some people it can help when increasing range due to the higher ‘range’ of the trumpet and its embouchure. So by all means, go for it! Hope this helps answer your question.

The Australian multi-instrumentalist James Morrison plays trumpet and trombone, as well as other brass instruments. To an exceedingly high standard. There are recordings available as proof. Check him out on YouTube where also plays flugelhorn horn and euphonium.
